summary: Following a scientific experiment, a man wakes up in a parallel universe and begins living a life similar to, but different from, his own.
cast: Samuel West|Kate Ashfield|David Burke|Shaun Parkes|Jemima Rooper|Laura Girling|Stuart Organ|Mandana Jones|Condoleezza Rice
keywords: scientific experiment|parallel universe|secretary of state|condoleezza rice
title: Random Quest
